channel.title: Cbr+pnk, Ma Nishtana, Fate: Skyship Concerto: Gauntlet Podcast
channel.description:
On the new Gauntlet Podcast @Auzumel_S and I talk with Chris Sellers about these three rpgs as well as GMless games and more.
Find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/cbrpnk-ma-nishtana-fate-skyship-concerto
